author: Sue Sciba Fox
content: I understand the health benefits of Carnivore, but I am so afraid it will be so monotonous and boring. Please share how you keep your meals diverse and appealing. BTW, I don‚Äôt eat organ cuts.

replies.content: Just follow the page for a while. People have very creative ideas.
It is a life changing diet, whatever you do give it 8 weeks and learn all you can.
Do you fear being bored over being unhealthy?
Jared Miller bored
I don't even want diverse anymore. Just give me a steak and I'm happy.

Sue Sciba Fox feel free to follow my tik tok page I‚Äôm in the same boat all variety and new recipes and ideas
May be an image of food

Eggs and bacon/sausage. Steak. Roast. Hamburger patties. Browned ground beef with extra butter. Carnivore casserole. And if you eat meat other than beef you‚Äôve got chicken varieties, pork chops‚Ä¶ Lots of yummy options.

Well, your assumption that we need food to entertain us with all sorts of colors or fancy stuff in all corners of the plate is wrong. You just don‚Äôt feel that way eating like this. But perhaps your understanding of just how many different kinds of mea‚Ä¶ See more
May be an image of text
Just eat and you won't be hungry

That‚Äôs understandable, but you need to do a mental shift to eating for nutrition rather eating for pleasure.
In the natural world before industrialization of the food supply, you could do both, because all of our food options were what was meant for ‚Ä¶ See more
Joe Wilson So very well stated! üëç
I eat when I am hungry to live, I don't live to eat anymore. So same food is not boring to me anymore.

I switch it up a fair bit. Some days my eggs are poached, scrambled, fried, hard boiled, deviled, over easy‚Ä¶you get the idea haha. For meat burgers, ground beef with sour cream, steak, meat balls, meat loaf. Lots of bacon, chicken wings, rotisserie chi‚Ä¶ See more

Meat can never get boring. I can eat a steak every day for the rest of my life and be good.
For most of the people its just a learned mentality that you need to eat variety and "balanced" diet. Animals eat mostly same food in the wild. Cows eat same t‚Ä¶ See more

I am not an organ meat fan either! I was also worried about the ‚Äúboring‚Äù aspect. But, I can tell you, I am 4 weeks in and I am loving and craving steak!!!! Steak and eggs is my go to and I am not bored with it at all - I crave it. I was a big poult‚Ä¶ See more

I think you will have to make a shift in your mindset. Technically we should eat to stay alive and be healthy. Unfortunately we have all strayed away from that and eat for taste and pleasure. It really depends on your goals and your whys. If your goals‚Ä¶ See more
Boring is the best part. Got so much free time from finding food, that i can awnser you. No eating is different, not even hungry as much. One or two meals a day.
Go to the butchers counter at the grocery store & take in the visual of the different cuts of meat. You can grill, bake or fry any of them with the seasonings of your liking! That's how I started!

Yeah I was worried about stopping smoking because I'd get bored, I believe it's the same for alcohol, crack and porn addiction...
That's what addiction does to people, makes you excited in anticipation and then you feel sick afterwards.
John Martin Moore truth
It isn‚Äôt

cravings for anything else other than steak and eggs went away around week 6 for me. I now just calmly eat my ribeye and eggs plus my fatty latte
at every meal, I only do two meals a day. I also was afraid of it get boring but I don‚Äôt even think about ‚Ä¶ See more

YouTube is your friend Maria Emmerich is just one example of many that has many cooking videos & has written cookbooks.

Pam Stokes Foreback yes, and her cookbook is called The Carnivore Cookbook. It‚Äôs such a great cookbook. Recipes are easy and she has so many ideas that I would never had thought about. I found it very exciting & encouraging! Nothing boring about her meals.
Many things in life are boring, but still good for me. So I find my entertainment and pleasure in other areas of my life. I do not use food as emotional regulation.

The beauty about carnivore is you can do a lot of different things depending on what you can tolerate so if you're not lying so you're not strict meat and organs but you are in the middle relaxed carnivore and you can tolerate dairy you have the benefi‚Ä¶ See more
It is a definite mind set change but put simply its ‚Äúeat to live‚Äù not live to eat!!!üí™üèº

To be honest, after a while you just don‚Äôt care and the food bondage is broken and gone.
You eat for different reasons and the mental torment fades away.
Fairly quickly too because you feel and sleep so good.
